rows.col_2: BUILD IN PUBLIC (or: THE LAUNCH, THE TRADE, ZERO TO ONE — MC picks final name with Nilo)
Watch a company get built from scratch using a 1,200-tab operating model, a team of strangers, and zero cash.
Business documentary / reality. Think: The Playlist meets How I Built This meets a live Twitch stream.
Honest, messy, real. Not polished corporate content. Not cringe hustle culture. Smart people figuring it out in real time.
Founders, operators, business nerds, people who like watching complex systems work. Secondary: potential hires and investors watching the company being born.

YouTube (long-form home base), TikTok/Reels/Shorts (daily highlights cut to clips), Spotify/Apple (audio versions of long-form). MC's choice on primary platform — they should go where they already have presence or feel strongest.

Clean, minimal. Dark background (charcoal/navy) with bright accent color (electric blue or IonWave brand color). Consistent lower-third with name + role for every guest. Episode number always visible. NOT startup-bro aesthetic. Think: Bloomberg meets MKBHD.

Face of guest + bold 3-5 word hook + episode number. High contrast. Consistent template so feed looks like a series, not random uploads. AI-generate 20 sample thumbnails to see how the feed looks at scale.
Length
1-3 hours raw (release full or edit to 45-90 min)
rows.col_4: Joe Rogan energy. Let it breathe. Go deep. Tangents are fine. The human moment is the content.
rows.col_5:
• Cold open (30 sec clip of best moment)
• MC intro (who is this person, why are they here)
• The conversation (unstructured, follow the energy)
• Closing (what's next for this person in the project)
• Post-roll (next episode preview)
